attributes.action: take action on petitions rather than simply make excuses as to why a petition should not be implemented.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
So far, this site has been used so that the public believes they have a voice in parliament, but very little has been done about petitions. Instead the Prime Minister makes excuses as to why a petition should not be looked into and debated in the House of Commons.

This petition asks the Prime Minister to stop making excuses, and to actually listen to the people of the country.

rejection.details: Comments on the petitions system should be sent to webmaster@pmo.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
